name: Nebuchadnezzar
description: Nebuchadnezzar is a fictional hovership captained by Morpheus in the The Matrix franchise.

name: Oracle
description: She is a prophet in the Matrix. She looks like a person, but is a computer program created for some perposes.

name: Agent Smith
description: Agent Smith is a fictional character and the main antagonist of The Matrix trilogy.

name: Switch
description: Switch was a member of the crew of the Nebuchadnezzar.
